data.message: Everyone shit talking eminem all your feelings fuckin hurt over shit he said, what the fucks it matter hate makes the world go round hes just gettin his name in peoples mouths like he has done so many times hes told his fans to more or less fuck off before and the same with a different president so whats it matter you hate him? Dont talk abouy him thats the best you can do, you talk about him hell just get more support and ill always support the GOAT

replies.message: The f****** douchebag said that if we supports Trump then f*** us when were the one that made him so yeah we're a little butthurt

Of course he said that shit its how he feels and a large number of people feel the same hes trying to sell big like he always does he did this shit with bush and got hella high ratings those years its just business in the end
Why do you think eminem goes platinum every album? Pure genius!!!
